short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns about twitter accounts that distribute Russian propaganda

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The program warns the user if the author of the displayed information was previously registered as having published disinformation or Russian propaganda and now tries to deceive you most likely.
